; refers to: ; one or more of member, character, story, pattern, collage, topic, resource
name: short name for search
text: question to ask
type: ONE of ordinal, nominal, text, boolean, value
choices: if ordinal/nominal: pipe delimited choices
help: optional text user sees as explanation
use help: optional text to explain to managers when question is best to use

name: and display
choices: if value: min | max
multiple: only applies if the question is ordinal or nominal

use for: if applies to all types, leave blank
choices: if boolean: yes text | no text

use for: neighborhood | interest or support group | family
name: Age
text: How old are you?

use for: neighborhood | interest or support group | family
name: Age
text: How old are you?
choices: very young | old enough | not so old | very old | ancient

use for: neighborhood | interest or support group | family
name: Gender
text: What is your gender?
choices: male | female

name: How long lived here
text: How long have you lived in this community?
choices: only a very short time | not very long | a while | a long time | a very long time

name: Where live
text: Where do you live?
help: Enter any sort of location you like | specific or vague.

name: Feel about community
text: How do you feel about this community?
choices: great | good | okay | not so great | bad | awful

name: How interested
text: How interested would you say you are in this topic?
choices: extremely | very | moderately | not much | not at all

name: How long involved
text: How long have you been involved with this issue?
choices: only a very short time | not very long | a while | a long time | a very long time

name: Why interested
text: What made you want to join this group?

name: Want to get
text: What do you want to get out of this group?

name: How long working
text: How long have you been working in this group?
choices: only a very short time | not very long | a while | a long time | a very long time

name: Position
text: What is your position in this work group?

name: Type of work
text: What sorts of work do you do in the group?

name: Talk to
text: Who would you say you talk to most often?

name: Children
text: How many children do you have, if any?
choices: none | one | two | three | four | five | six | seven | eight | nine | ten | more than ten

name: Live closest to
text: Who do you live the closest to?

name: How feel about
text: How do you feel about this story?
choices: happy | enthused | hopeful | relieved | indifferent | confused | sad | angry | frustrated | hopeless | grateful | amazed | intrigued | amused

name: Intensity
text: How much emotional intensity would you say this story holds for you?
choices: an overwhelming amount | a lot | some but not a lot | hardly any | none at all

name: Reason
text: Why do you think this story was told?
choices: to inform | to help | to educate | to persuade | to praise | to criticize | to entertain | to reminisce | to get along | for fun

name: Happened to
text: To whom did this story happen?
choices: to the person who told it | to another person who told it to the storyteller | to someone the storyteller knows | the teller heard it around | everyone knows it | I'm not sure

name: Will remember
text: How long do you think you will remember the events that happened in this story?
choices: for as long as I live | for a very long time | for a while but it will fade | not for very long | only briefly | what story?

name: How feel about
text: How do you feel about this pattern?
choices: happy | enthused | hopeful | relieved | indifferent | confused | sad | angry | frustrated | hopeless | grateful | amazed | intrigued | amused

name: Strength
text: How strong would you say this pattern is?
choices: overwhelmingly strong | very strong | pretty strong | pretty weak | very weak | barely there
help: How much does the pattern stand out?

name: Interpretations
text: What do you think this pattern means?
help: Venture an opinion on why the pattern appears the way it does.

name: Implications
text: What do you think should be done about this pattern?
help: If this pattern represents a problem, what can be done about it? If it represents and opportunity, what can be done to benefit from it?

name: How feel about
text: How do you feel about this collage?
choices: happy | enthused | hopeful | relieved | indifferent | confused | sad | angry | frustrated | hopeless | grateful | amazed | intrigued | amused

name: Reason
text: Why do you think this collage was created?
choices: to inform | to help | to educate | to persuade | to praise | to criticize | to entertain | to reminisce | to get along | for fun

name: Useful to
text: Is there anyone you think will find this collage especially useful?

name: Refers to
text: Is this collage in reference to any particular event, person, place, time, or thing?
help: Is there anything this collage is about in particular?

name: Type of topic
text: What type of topic is this?
choices: story elicitation | announcement | plan | reminder | statement | argument | opinion | article | information | question | complaint | spark | issue | feeling | idea | thought | other

name: How feel about
text: How do you feel about this topic?
choices: happy | enthused | hopeful | relieved | indifferent | confused | sad | angry | frustrated | hopeless | grateful | amazed | intrigued | amused

name: Reason
text: Why do you think this topic was created?
choices: to inform | to help | to educate | to persuade | to praise | to criticize | to entertain | to reminisce | to get along | for fun

name: Intensity
text: How much emotional intensity would you say this topic holds for you?
choices: an overwhelming amount | a lot | some but not a lot | hardly any | none at all

name: Who should respond
text: Who in particular do you think should respond to this topic?
help: Is there any group of people who would best be able to respond to this topic?

name: How feel about
text: How do you feel about this resource?
choices: happy | enthused | hopeful | relieved | indifferent | confused | sad | angry | frustrated | hopeless | grateful | amazed | intrigued | amused

name: Source
text: Where did this resource come from?

name: Further info
text: Where should people look if they need more information related to this resource?
